title: please help - d3dx9_39.dll is missing
body: I restored my laptop to factory settings and now when i try to launch a custom game or any game i assume it says "The program cant start becuase d3dx9_39.dll is missing from your computer. how do i fix this???

replies.body:
The DLL file you're referencing is part of the Microsoft Directx program. You should be able to clear this error out after running some windows updates and installing [**this Directx package**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=34429).

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
